sentences.english: Draw lessons from mistake,don't make same mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 从错误中吸取教训，不要重犯旧错。

sentences.english: Our focus now should bein drawing lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在的重点应当是吸取教训。

sentences.english: A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in on the experience. -(Elbert Hubbard)
sentences.chinese: 失败者是犯了错误而不能从中吸取教训的人。

sentences.english: We can take lessons of the successes and failures from that.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从那些成功或失败的例子吸取教训。

sentences.english: The second thing to do after realizing the inevitability of it all is to learn from it.
sentences.chinese: 第二点，在意识到它的不可避免性之后，吸取教训。

sentences.english: We should draw a moral from the startling fact.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当从这些触目惊心的事实中吸取教训。

sentences.english: Shriver said people should gain a lesson from the incident.
sentences.chinese: 施立弗说，人们应该从这件事中吸取教训。

sentences.english: Failure is success if we learn from it.
sentences.chinese: 果能从失败中吸取教训，失败亦是成功。

sentences.english: We should learn by the mistakes of others.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该从别人的错误中吸取教训。

sentences.english: It is time we finally learned the lessons of this lost decade.
sentences.chinese: 这失去的十年，我们终于学会吸取教训，是时候了。

sentences.english: They want to learn from our mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望从我们的错误中吸取教训。

sentences.english: Mr. Wong understands something that Lakers fans found out long ago, and the lesson remains relevant to this day.
sentences.chinese: 王先生从湖人球迷那儿吸取教训，直至今日任然受用。

sentences.english: They should learn a lesson from this incident :he who plays with fire will surely get burnt.
sentences.chinese: 他们应从这件事中吸取教训，玩火者必自焚。

sentences.english: And President Pinera said lessons have to be learnt from the accident.
sentences.chinese: 皮涅拉总统表示，必须从这次事故中吸取教训。

sentences.english: If you fall, get up, and learn from it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你失败了，站起来，并吸取教训。

sentences.english: We all learn something from doing that.
sentences.chinese: 那样做的话，我们都会吸取教训。
